author: @nuckm
text: Dude if we could have an animation like this for every mathematical, statistical, or deep learning related construct, things like einsum too, I believe we could have even script kiddies contributing to the field. It's all about building the right mental model, the visualization of these procedures, the same way we learned to add numbers on paper in elementary school not by thinking but visually, and this video does just that for a basic part of DL. Need more of it, a lot more.

author: @nikilragav
text: I was kind of confused what was happening at first, but towards the middle of fitting the sine function I had an ah hah moment. Still didn't fully understand how bias on the neuron affected the position but never the less very very cool. NN as a function approximator makes visual sense now to me vs generic amorphous sense
